news.title: Mark Zuckerberg is all in on AI as the new social media

news.title: Windows 11 has reached 1 billion users faster than Windows 10
news.summary: Windows 11 now has 1 billion users. Microsoft hit the milestone during the recent holiday quarter, meaning Windows 11 has managed to reach 1 billion users faster than Windows 10 did nearly six years ago. "Windows reached a big milestone, 1 billion Windows 11 users," said Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella

news.title: Tesla discontinuing Model S and Model X to make room for robots
news.summary: Tesla will discontinue the Model S and Model X in the second quarter of 2026, Elon Musk said in an earnings call with investors today. news.title: Data Centers Are Driving a US Gas Boom
